stories.title: Director Christopher Wray Announces Actions to Disrupt and Prosecute

stories.text:
I've noticed drinking just isn't much fun anymore. It used to make my happy and now I am more likely to become sad or angry. Even with just one drink.

I also used to need it to get on stage to play music(again just 1 or maybe 2), and I no longer do, and I've found I play a lot better stone sober.

Does anyone else relate or unrelate?

Can someone out there tell me about how you continue to enjoy drinking in moderation as you get older?
stories.title: Ask HN: Non-Alcoholics Who Quit Drinking, Why Did You Decide, and What Happened?

stories.text:
I’m trying to move away from Google services this year, but I still have to find a good alternative to Google Docs.

What I’m looking for is an online writing application, that supports sharing in-progress work and allowing reviewers to comment inline. What do you use, if you’re not using Google Docs?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are good alternatives to Google Docs for collaborative writing?
